ftbquests.chapter.0CCB7C52D9D7412E.title: Advanced Magic
ftbquests.chapter.0CCB7C52D9D7412E.quest: &dHmm? &aWhy so much?
&cWell, you'll need quite a lot later on
&dCan burn up to 32 items
&aCould make for a nice fuel source for Fire莲
&dYou must craft keys to access other rooms in the Overworld, otherwise there won't be enough space to build the Omnitower structure
&4Just place &aMicro Gravitic Projector&4 on top of &6Dirt&4&4~
&4Due to some magical bugs,
&athe Enchantment Device&4 is crafted using a different multi-block recipe,
&4using the &dBlueprint Cannon&c to print my blueprint &ainto the world&c,
&4then right-clicking on the &6Elytric Ingot&c with the &6Elytric Block&4 in the middle
&aMaybe it could be used to right-click a keyhole
&dThe first image shows an already-programmed Lightning bolt
[&6Crafting Table&f]&bSequence is as follows:
&l&a[Activation: Lightning bolt]   &c[Operator: Vector Tracking]    &a[Operator: Entity Sight]
&l                                &a[Operator: Entity Position]    &c[Selector: Spellcaster]
&bA few things to keep in mind:
&cThe &fOperator: Vector Tracking&c's &a&lPosition&f and &a&lRay&4 must be set up as shown below
Mana Relays
&ata's stress has been amplified, changed from 512su to 1024su.
&c(&mWhat? You asked where the windmill went? There's no windmill!)
Later, you can use the Star Gem Beast Treadwheel (the stress it generates has also been amplified).
&dWhen setting its mana input,
&cit can only accept mana from a Mana Vat,
&4and not from a Mana Relay
&aIn short, when setting its mana input, simply:
&aRight-click &dDomination Staff&e on a &aMana Vat,
&aThen right-click &dDomination Staff&e on a &aMana Workstation
&cAltars can only be crafted in the Overworld, they won't drop anything in Micro Dimension!
&aItems will not drop after crafting due to the Compact Space Wall above.
&dTherefore, you need to create an Item Collector to collect them.
&cAltars can only be crafted in the Overworld. No drops will occur if crafted in a Micro World!
&aItems will not drop after crafting due to the Compact Space Wall above.
&dTherefore, you need to create an Item Collector to collect them.
Spark Upgrade
&aAdd Output/Extract upgrades to the drawers from left to right.
&dPlace the corresponding materials to achieve automation.
&cIt is recommended to use XNet to control the number of items in the drawer to always be 1 for automation. The shown method may consume materials.
&aYou must drink this to perform the rune ritual.
&aThe magic consumed by the rune ritual must come from
&d[an (Advanced/Ultimate) Ring of Mana in the player's inventory]/&e[Aerothorn (Floating) Rune]
1.&aThe magic consumed by the rune ritual must come from
&d[an (Advanced/Ultimate) Ring of Mana in the player's inventory]/&e[Aerothorn (Floating) Rune]
2.&aYou must drink the&a Horn of Gjallar filled with Mimir's Spring Water &ato perform the rune ritual
3.&bIf there is enough magic nearby, the&e Aerothorn (Floating) Rune &acan automatically activate the ritual.
&bPlease complete the automation from the previous chapter before moving on to the next.
&dDon't rush through progress blindly.
&aThis might be used to right-click a keyhole.
&dThis space is specifically reserved for automating Celestial Bar production.

ftbquests.chapter.284C737C09134719.title: Welcome
ftbquests.chapter.284C737C09134719.quest: &dThere seems to be something here for the start of the game.
&cta might be hidden inside certain items.
&aIf an item has information in its REI entry,
&aAll multi-block structures have blueprints that can be found at the Blueprint Table and previewed in the world.
&cps: Please do not&4&lshift+right-click&r&c on blueprints, causing crashes will not be our responsibility.
&aI have disabled many rules, as follows:
&dThanks to the following contributors to the modpack development:
All friends in the beta group
&dThanks to Qiu Ming for the livestream and video promotion
&aQiu Ming's Huya Livestream: Qiu Ming-Hei Tao A
&aI have used LockDown to lock the generated map
&dYou can only play within this map
&cThe starting space is not compressed space generation, but manually built, so don't try to leave
&c1. This is a test version and does not represent the final quality
&c2. Spreading in any form before the official release will be held responsible. This version is only tested in my group
&aIf you have suggestions or bugs, please join the group
&bps:&fThis modpack &cdoes not consider supporting &amultiplayer server &4island development &fgameplay. I am not responsible for any bugs that occur in this case
&aDo not directly connect the two custom machines that &dcraft/output&e mana/magic&a with the &5Dominating Wand
How do you want to get out? Try PSI &aWizard: Flash&f

ftbquests.chapter.354FF9E33E408A04.quest: &bThe repair method is as shown below
By synthesizing with a &cMana Source Gem (Block)&f in a crafting table, &arepairing&c (will not be destroyed when used)
&aTo craft this item
&dYour CAD needs at least the following configuration
&c[Basic CAD Core]&a[Psi Metal CAD Body]&c[Basic CAD Magazine]
&aTo craft this item

Breaking this block &cwill not drop &athe original drops
Drawers
Although &aElegant Storage&f's various &chigh-tier chests&4&l cannot be crafted&r
&dYou can upgrade your &dchests&f with an &eelevated->gold upgrade&f.
When placed in the world, it randomly generates a type of elemental source point
&l&9I've modified the config file to make it &4infinite&9.
&dYou can automate lava using the method shown below
&aChop Sage on a Cutting Board

ftbquests.chapter.425939884D3DD947.title: Beginnings
ftbquests.chapter.425939884D3DD947.quest: &ashift+Right click with the magical stick on a &cCompact Space Wall/Block&c to obtain
&dHow do I get this stick? Check if there's any gift that includes it~
ps:&bIt could be in any of the gifts given~
&aUse reward items and Block Placer for automation!
Mana Source Gem
&cYou need to combine an&a Basic CAD Core&c and&a Basic CAD Magazine&c in a CAD Assembler to use the Infusion mode.
&dThe Basic CAD Battery is optional.
&cDoes not consume the block when right-clicked
&b[Water droplet right-clicks on &d Dirt&b to transform it into water]
&aThere's a 20%% chance to transform a Mana Clay Ball into a Clay Ball when thrown into water.
&ashift+Right-click with an empty hand on a&c Grass Block&a to have a 2%% chance to obtain
&aCan burn up to 4 items
&aWater droplet right-clicks on &d Dirt&a to transform it into water
Get it by &ashing&c Grass
&cYou need to combine an&a Basic CAD Core&c and&a Basic CAD Magazine&c in a CAD Assembler to use the Explosive mode.
&dThe Basic CAD Battery is optional.
&dThe first image below shows an already edited Explosive sequence
[Crafted in a&6 Syntesis Table&f]&bThe sequence is:
&l&a[Trigger: Explosion]   &c[Operator: Vector Trace]    &a[Operator: Entity Sight]
&l&c[Constant: Number]        &a[Operator: Entity Position]    &c[Selector: Caster]
&bPay special attention to:
&cOperator: Vector Trace&f's&a&l Position&f and&a&l Ray&4 must be&f as shown in the second image below
&m&dWhere could it be hidden?

ftbquests.chapter.7EE6FC8676203376.title: Deeper Development
ftbquests.chapter.7EE6FC8676203376.quest: Due to limitations, you can't summon Gaia the regular way. Try a modded approach!
&4Right-click the&a containment jar on the ground with&a the jar to obtain the&b jar containing&f Gaia
Synthesis steps for&a Enchantment&2 [Other Sequence Assembly]
&cNeeds to be synthesized in the corresponding machine, not by holding the item in a mechanical arm
&dThe general method is as shown in the image below
&dThe middle block is&a Machine动力's&c Fluid Tank
&6Refer to the&a Fluid Tank's&b Contemplation&f (last one)   &f or
(&aFake Fluid Tank&f is only used to provide GUI support for world recipes)
This machine is only for providing a recipe GUI
&dYou can perhaps use it to automate when it emits a&c 15-block Redstone signal after being filled with elements
&6Placing a gold block in front can produce 4096 stress
[The first Runic Lumber can be obtained by planting a sapling on dirt, then bonemealing it]
&9It can be planted in a Planter Pot
&m&cHowever, pressing 'u' on a Planter Pot doesn't show its recipe
&m&cBut pressing 'r' on an existing product does show the recipe
&m&4I have reported this issue to the mod author
&aThis bug has been fixed by the original author
&aAdjust these redstone devices according to router speed
&5Example encoding in the Redstone Logic Controller:
&aWhen placed on the ground, breaking it drops four imprint templates
&aMain Hand: &bCreative Element Conduit  &aOff Hand: &eGaia Essence Ingot
&4Right-click the&a containment jar on the ground with&a the jar to obtain the&b jar containing&f Wither
&aWith this, you'll have almost endless mana!
&aIn this modpack, you can add &2Energy&f and &bSpeed&f upgrades to machines that accept them, up to 64 upgrades.
&5However, I &crecommend&5 adding no more than &c16&5 (thus I've limited their stack size to 16).
&bPlease complete the automation from the previous chapter before moving on to the next.

ftbquests.chapter.ac.quests13.descriptio: First, craft a &cEmpty&f Soul Crystal with a &aTerra Firma Plate&f
&fThen infuse it with a &aSoul of a Young Skeleton&f to make a &cSoul Crystal with a Young Skeleton&f
&bFor upgrading Soul Crystals, try a Recursive Crystal
ftbquests.chapter.ac.quests33.descriptio: Similar to the original Spirit Door in Botania
&aRefer to CM for the specific structure
&bEach operation consumes 1000 mana from each mana pool
&cRight-click the&a Spirit Door Core with&a a Forest Staff&r&c while both mana pools have &a10000 or more&d mana

ftbquests.chapter.0CCB7C52D9D7412.water_: &dThere must be 2 or more large water wheels in the item slot to generate electricity
&aFor each additional large water wheel, the power generation increases by 30FE
&cUp to 16 large water wheels can be placed, which is equivalent to 480FE
